Author: danw
Content:
Whoah, as the viewer numbers climbed rapidly the quality of conversation in the chat quickly dropped off.

I've seen this link posted far too many times in there: http://www.penny-arcade.com/comic/2004/03/19

Author: amichail
Content: Another idea applicable if this sort of thing becomes more popular would be to allow viewers to click on people in the live video feed who are broadcasting their lives to switch to those people's live feed.

Author: amichail
Content: For example, when Justin meets someone for the first time, viewers might get the opportunity to show flashbacks from Justin's life to give a first impression.

Author: amichail
Title: Any ideas on taking justin.tv further by allowing viewers to more actively participate in Justin's life?

Author: papersmith
Content: Looks like a public version of campfire.\nhttp://www.campfirenow.com/

Author: staunch
Content: Yeah, that would be good I think. I usually modify the title anyway after submission, since most page's <title>'s aren't very good.
